basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with experience in full-cycle product development, including backend services (Python, Go, Node.js), system architecture, and quality assurance. Proven ability to apply diverse technologies, including C#, to solve complex problems. Experienced in agile, international team environments and committed to delivering high-quality, efficient software solutions.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Contributed to end-to-end development of ML and robotics systems in a cross-functional team, focusing on backend services, system integration, and software quality.
highlights: Engineered an end-to-end ML ad detection system, handling the full lifecycle from Python/TensorFlow training infrastructure to deployment.
Ensured software quality through rigorous code reviews and maintenance of Linux-based infrastructure.
Developed backend components for a robotics simulation platform using Python and OpenAI APIs, reducing manual inputs by ~30%.
Partnered with UI/UX teams in an agile environment and provided mentorship to junior developers.

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Developed and integrated backend microservices within a complex, multi-service platform.
highlights: Developed Go backend components and utilized gRPC for inter-service communication.
Implemented and tested data models and serialization flows across distributed services.
Assisted with platform integrations, connecting a Telegram bot to backend APIs and supporting authentication flows.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Designed and built an award-winning internal automation tool to solve team workflow inefficiencies.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide Innovation Contest for 'Otis', a JavaScript-based tool that automated form-filling and email generation.
Significantly improved team efficiency by automating repetitive workflows using JavaScript and RegEx.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for creating 'Otis', an automation tool that streamlined team workflows and significantly improved efficiency.
